lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Lillian P.,age 99, died March 2, 2016. Funeral will be held at 10am on Sunday, March 6 at Schwartz Brothers Jeffer Memorial Chapel, 114-03 Queens Blvd, Forest Hills, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAUFMAN, LILLIAN P.
